verses.verse: (A Mikhtam of David.) Preserve<WH8104> me, O God,<WH410> for I take<WH2620> refuge<WH2620> in Thee.
I said<WH559> to the Lord,<WH3068> "Thou art my Lord;<WH136> I have no<WH1077> good<WH9186> besides<WH5921> Thee."
As for the saints<WH6918> who<WH834> are in the earth,<WH776> They are the majestic<WH117> ones<WH117> in whom is all<WH3605> my delight.<WH2656>

The sorrows<WH6094> of those who have bartered<WH4117> for another<WH312> [god] will be multiplied;<WH7235> I shall not pour<WH5258> out their libations<WH5262> of blood,<WH1818> Nor<WH1077> shall I take<WH5375> their names<WH8034> upon my lips.<WH8193>
The Lord<WH3068> is the portion<WH4521> of my inheritance<WH2506> and my cup;<WH3563> Thou dost support<WH8551> my lot.<WH1486>
The lines<WH9112> have fallen<WH5307> to me in pleasant<WH5273> places; Indeed,<WH637> my heritage<WH5159> is beautiful<WH9629> to me.
I will bless<WH1288> the Lord<WH3068> who<WH834> has counseled<WH3289> me; Indeed,<WH637> my mind<WH3629> instructs<WH3256> me in the night.<WH3915>
I have set<WH7737> the Lord<WH3068> continually<WH8548> before<WH5048> me; Because<WH3588> He is at my right<WH3225> hand,<WH3225> I will not be shaken.<WH4131>
Therefore<WH3651> my heart<WH3820> is glad,<WH8055> and my glory<WH9202> rejoices;<WH1523> My flesh<WH1320> also<WH637> will dwell<WH7931> securely.<WH983>
For Thou wilt not abandon<WH5800> my soul<WH5315> to Sheol;<WH7585> Neither<WH3808> wilt Thou allow<WH5414> Thy Holy<WH2623> One<WH2623> to undergo<WH7845> decay.<WH7845>

Thou wilt make<WH3045> known<WH3045> to me the path<WH734> of life;<WH9132> In Thy presence<WH6440> is fulness<WH7648> of joy;<WH8057> In Thy right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> there are pleasures<WH5273> forever.<WH5331>
